languages.text: Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each attack made by the Vanguard makes them a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by that attack.
languages.original_text: До начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангарда{/g} каждая совершенная им {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} делает его {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для всех противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}удар{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Until the start of the Vanguard's next turn, each attack made by the Vanguard makes them a priority target for the enemy hit by that attack.
Until the start of the Vanguard's next turn, each attack made by the Vanguard makes them a priority target for the enemy hit by that attack.

languages.text: До начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангарда{/g} каждая совершенная им {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} делает его {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для всех противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}удар{/g}.

traits.locale_text: До начала следующего хода авангарда каждая совершенная им атака делает его приоритетной целью для всех противников, получивших удар.
До начала следующего хода авангарда каждая совершенная им атака делает его приоритетной целью для всех противников, получивших удар.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}的攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，先锋都会成为该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，效果持续至先锋的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
languages.original_text: Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each attack made by the Vanguard makes them a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by that attack.

traits.locale_text: 每当先锋的攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人时，先锋都会成为该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，效果持续至先锋的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

languages.text: Hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g}, cada ataque que realice le convierte en un {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} del enemigo que reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} de ese ataque.
languages.original_text: Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each attack made by the Vanguard makes them a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by that attack.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del vanguardia, cada ataque que realice le convierte en un {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} del enemigo que reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} de ese ataque.

languages.text: Bis zum Start des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} macht jeder ihrer Angriffe sie zu einem {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} des Feindes, der von diesem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} wird.
languages.original_text: Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each attack made by the Vanguard makes them a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by that attack.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Start der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} der Vorhut macht jeder ihrer Angriffe sie zu einem {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} des Feindes, der von diesem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffen{/g} wird.

languages.text: Jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Patrouilleur{/g}, chaque attaque menée par celui-ci fait de lui une {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} pour l'ennemi {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g} par cette attaque.
languages.original_text: Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each attack made by the Vanguard makes them a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by that attack.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Patrouilleur, chaque attaque menée par celui-ci fait de lui une {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} pour l'ennemi {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touché{/g} par cette attaque.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、ヴァンガードが攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}させた敵は、ヴァンガードを{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}とする。
languages.original_text: Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each attack made by the Vanguard makes them a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by that attack.

traits.locale_text: ヴァンガードの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、ヴァンガードが攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}させた敵は、ヴァンガードを{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}とする。
